panels.description: The number of global partitions as observed by this Controller.

panels.description: The number of offline topic partitions (non-internal) as observed by this Controller.
panels.title: Offline Partition Count

panels.description: The count of topic partitions for which the leader is not the preferred leader.
panels.title: Preferred Replica Imbalance Count

panels.description: Number of unknown voter connection
panels.title: Unknown Voter Connection

panels.description: The high watermark maintained on a member; -1 if it is unknown.
panels.title: High Watermark

panels.description: Incoming message rate per topic. Omitting 'topic=(...)' will yield the all-topic rate.
panels.title: Messages in topics

panels.description: Fetch request (from clients or followers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Fetch request rate

panels.description: The first offset in a partition.
panels.title: First offset partitions

panels.description: The last offset in a partition.
panels.title: Last offset partitions

panels.description: Linux disk reads in MiB
panels.title: Disk read

panels.description: Linux disk write in MiB
panels.title: Disk writes

panels.description: Total number of messages per topic
panels.title: Number of Messages

panels.description: Producer request made in all the brokers
panels.title: Producer requests

panels.description: The average time in milliseconds to commit an entry in the raft log.
panels.title: Average Commit Latency

panels.description: The current quorum epoch.
panels.title: Quorum Epoch

panels.description: Byte in/out (from the clients) rate per topic every 5m
panels.title: Byte in/out rate from clients

panels.description: between 0 and 1, ideally > 0.3
panels.title: The average fraction of time the request handler threads are idle

panels.description: Byte in (from the clients) rate per topic. Omitting 'topic=(...)' will yield the all-topic rate.
panels.title: Byte in/out total from clients

panels.description: Byte out (to the other brokers) rate per topic.
panels.title: Byte out rate to other brokers
